Container.Name: rreading-glasses
Container.Overview:
rreading-glasses is a drop-in replacement for the official metadata provider that delivers lightning-fast, high-coverage book and author data to your Arr-based library clients (e.g. Readarr, Calibre).
- Speeds up searches and imports by caching metadata in memory and Postgres - Supports very large authors and upcoming releases not found in the official service - Coalesces, percolates and compresses responses to minimize upstream requests - Provides full Goodreads compatibility or can proxy the open-source Hardcover API - Ships as a multi-arch Docker image or a single Go binary-no data dumps or special dependencies
Container.Requires: Postgres Either: – A valid Goodreads session cookie (to avoid 1 RPS throttling on Goodreads queries) – OR a Hardcover API Bearer token (for Hardcover upstream)

Config.Description: The password for the Postgres user.

Config.Description: Cookie used for upstream HTTP requests.
